attr.title: Recursive Run
attr.desc:
# Details:
This game was made for IcoJam 2024 with the theme of Patterns.

It is a fast-paced platformer with a speed-run timer. Every level is the previous level + a twist or something new. This is how the theme is incorporated.

# Controls:
• D-PAD to move
• A/B to jump
• X/Y to retry
• START to pause

Showcase Video

Details:

This game was made for IcoJam 2024 with the theme of Patterns.

It is a fast-paced platformer with a speed-run timer. Every level is the previous level + a twist or something new. This is how the theme is incorporated.

Share your scores! (itch.io page)

Controls:

  • D-PAD to move
  • A/B to jump
  • X/Y to retry
  • START to pause
